inclusion.criterion: unilateral thyroid carcinoma and contralateral benign nodule
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: contralateral nodules ≤ 20mm and located in the thyroid gland
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: clinical node-negative cervical compartment at palpation and neck ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous history of neck radiation therapy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and previous history of neck surgery and radiation therapy, making them likely ineligible for the trial.
